game.name: 30 days to survive
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "30 days to survive" - the game is going day, in a world where there is a zombie Apocalypse! The protagonist has to survive 30 days on a randomly generated map full of dead.
